thread.title: Majestic "Take October" Streak Fleece Performance Hoodie A Home Run
thread.title_full: Majestic "Take October" Streak Fleece Performance Hoodie A Home Run - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Majestic "Take October" Streak Fleece Performance Hoodie A Home Run
text:
Majestic Athletic
Exclusive Player Hoodie seamlessly integrates technology and fashion on-field during the 2015 MLB Postseason.
TAMPA, Fla. , Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- For years, the Major League Baseball Postseason has provided compelling theater for Majestic to introduce new apparel. This year is no different with the "Take October" Streak Fleece Hoodie taking center stage.
The Streak Fleece Performance Hoodie offers a visual aesthetic unlike any on-field apparel in professional sports. Designed with streak effect fleece, Therma Base® technologies, and metallic aluminum inks, this garment fuses function and contemporary style resulting in the best of both worlds for players and fans alike. The style works, and the function shines.
"MLB Postseason Baseball and Majestic championship product have become synonymous with October," says Jim Pisani , President at Majestic Athletic. "Our design team understands how to develop innovative product with a blended purpose – design functionality and graphic elements that capture the emotional connection between fans and their team."
Throughout this MLB Postseason, some of the most enduring images are being captured on-field with players celebrating in their "Take October" Streak Fleece performance hoodies. This exposure combined with cooler weather markets have helped create tremendous demand from retailers and fans alike.
"Our line-up of cutting-edge championship products play a role in the overall narrative of MLB's Postseason each year," says Dana Parker , Majestic Vice President Merchandising and Design. "Fans want to feel connected with their team's success, but at the same time place a premium on looking good and feeling comfortable. We have successfully merged function and fashion with the 'Take October' Streak Fleece."
The Majestic "Take October" Streak Fleece Performance Hoodie is available in all MLB Postseason Markets and online at MajesticAthletic.com and MLB.COM.
ABOUT MAJESTIC ATHLETIC
Majestic Athletic designs, markets and manufactures performance athletic apparel, team uniforms, outerwear and licensed athletic wear. Majestic is the official on-field uniform of Major League Baseball and is also licensed by the Major League Baseball Players Association (MLBPA), National Football League (NFL), National Basketball Association (NBA), National Hockey League (NHL) and Collegiate Licensing Company (CLC). For more information on Majestic Athletic visit: www.majesticathletic.com
